question: The Sadar Diwani Adalat was established at which of the following places under Warren Hastings Plan 1772?
explanation: A Sadar Diwani Adalat was established at Calcutta which exercised appellate jurisdiction over Mofussil Diwani Adalats in all cases where the subject-matter of the suit exceeded Rs. 500/-. This Court comprised Governor as its President and at least two members of the Council aided by Diwan of Treasury and Chief Kanungos.
